title: What are some technological advances you hope to see in the next 50 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because this is more into a personal question with many different views and thoughts depending on the person’s preferences so these are the technological advances I hope to see in the next 50 years: Flying carsHoverboardsHologram touch screens and displaysColonies on Mars and possibly on other planetsPossibly usage of asteroids as a source of fuel and other materialsSupersonic commercial jets with advanced systems and AI assistance and intelligenceHyperloops all over countriesElectric vehicles dominating the fuel,petrol,gas… powered vehicles marketCompletely electric powered airplanesSpace travel as easy and accessible as modern airplane travelingSpace elevatorsTop notch healthcare systems capable of prevention of diseases and effectively overcome any possible global pandemics…

18 here. I don’t. Between our cars and agriculture and computers, what more could we want in that department? But I just keep on hearing stories about people who end up with useless degrees, and a turbulent political climate, and a more stifling PC culture, and by the way the earth is dying. We have everything to think about EXCEPT technology.
